metadata.name: Waves
metadata.description:
Waves represents the vulnerability and fragility of 
human beings in the face of death. 
Itâ€™s a reflection on how to confront the void it leaves behind. 
It speaks of a feeling of emptiness, discomfort, 
and rumination on the past. 
It speaks of grieving after the loss of a loved one. 
Memories flood our minds and every element of 
daily life becomes a hook to think about the lost soul. 
This increases sadness, melancholy, and anger. 
Sometimes the pain stops but then returns like waves of the sea. 
The protagonist feels like a wreckage: 
he feels broken, without a goal and stranded in his pain. 
We cannot escape the ghost that lives in our mind. 
We must accept the fate of our life, celebrating it in all its forms.
